name: groupBy
description: Groups together events by one or more specified fields. Similar to the GROUP BY method in SQL databases. Can execute aggregate functions on each group. Results are returned in the _field parameter for each aggregate function.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Array of field names to group by

parameters.name: function
parameters.description: Aggregate functions to apply to each group (e.g., count(), collect())

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of groups to return (use 'max' for unlimited)

examples: | groupBy([aid, UserSid], function=([count(aid, as=executionCount), collect([CommandLine])]), limit=max)
notes: The _count field is automatically created if the count() function is used.
